concept.title: Explore
concept.shortdesc: After you have generated your first API test case or web test case using Web Recorder and added it to a test suite for execution, explore the unique testing capabilities of .

conbody.p: This document shows you the capabilities of in the testing cycle, along with some unique capabilities when creating automated tests.
If you are using for the first time, refer to the following onboarding guide for more information: .
